tutorial.title: Data Visualization Basics
tutorial.subject: Data Science
tutorial.theory:
Visualization leverages the human brain's pattern recognition. 
- **Line**: Time series.
- **Bar**: Categorical comparison.
- **Histogram**: Distribution.
- **Scatter**: Relationship.

common_mistakes.correction: Avoid Pie Charts. It is hard for humans to compare angles. Use Bar charts instead.
common_mistakes.example: 3D Exploded Pie Charts are the worst.

tutorial.summary: A picture is worth a thousand pandas rows.
